verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD שִׁ֣ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> song חָדָ֑שׁ <S%H2319><s%> a new תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <S%H8416><s%> [and] his praise בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> in the congregation חֲסִידִֽים׃ <S%H2623><s%> of saints

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> rejoice יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Let Israel בְּעֹשָׂ֑יו <S%H6213><s%> in him that made בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> him let the children צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion יָגִ֥ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> be joyful בְמַלְכָּֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> in their King

יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> Let them praise שְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name בְמָח֑וֹל <S%H4234><s%> in the dance בְּתֹ֥ף <S%H8596><s%> unto him with the timbrel וְ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> and harp יְזַמְּרוּ־ <S%H2167><s%> let them sing praises לֽוֹ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רוֹצֶ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> taketh pleasure יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> in his people יְפָאֵ֥ר <S%H6286><s%> he will beautify עֲ֝נָוִ֗ים <S%H6035><s%> the meek בִּישׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> with salvation

יַעְלְז֣וּ <S%H5937><s%> be joyful חֲסִידִ֣ים <S%H2623><s%> Let the saints בְּכָב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> in glory יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> let them sing aloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4904><s%> upon their beds

רוֹמְמ֣וֹת <S%H7319><s%> [Let] the high אֵ֭ל <S%H410><s%> [praises] of God בִּגְרוֹנָ֑ם <S%H1627><s%> [be] in their mouth וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword פִּֽיפִיּ֣וֹת <S%H6374><s%> and a twoedged בְּיָדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> in their hand

לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> To execute נְ֭קָמָה <S%H5360><s%> vengeance בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> upon the heathen תּֽ֝וֹכֵחֹ֗ת <S%H8433><s%> [and] punishments בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> upon the people

לֶאְסֹ֣ר <S%H631><s%> To bind מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4428><s%> their kings בְּזִקִּ֑ים <S%H2131><s%> with chains וְ֝נִכְבְּדֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H3513><s%> and their nobles בְּכַבְלֵ֥י <S%H3525><s%> with fetters בַרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> of iron

לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> To execute בָּהֶ֨ם ׀ מִשְׁפָּ֬ט <S%H4941><s%> upon them the judgment כָּת֗וּב <S%H3789><s%> written הָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> this honour ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> This לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <S%H2623><s%> have all his saints הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
